name: INF Parallel Type GateFamily: cirq.ops.common_gates.XPowGate
description:
Accepts
1. `cirq.Gate` instances `g` s.t. `isinstance(g, cirq.ops.common_gates.XPowGate)` OR
2. `cirq.ParallelGate` instance `g` s.t. `g.sub_gate` satisfies 1. and `cirq.num_qubits(g) <= INF` OR
3. `cirq.Operation` instance `op` s.t. `op.gate` satisfies 1. or 2.
